accountItem.regularWarning: Removing this address doesn't delete your recovery phrase or any private keys. Instead it just hides it from the extension and you won't be able to use it until you add it back.
accountItem.loudWarningTitle: Removing this address will remove its associated account from the UI.
accountItem.loudWarningBody: Are you sure you want to proceed?
accountItem.lastAccountWarningTitle: Once this account is removed you won't be able to use the wallet until you complete onboarding again.
accountItem.lastAccountWarningBody: Are you sure you want to proceed?
accountItem.removeConfirm: Yes, I want to remove it

showPrivateKey.warningMessage: Anybody that has your Private Key can move your assets.

exportingPrivateKey.confirmationDesc: I understand that other Private Keys, Recovery Phrases, Ledger or  Read-only accounts will not be saved with this recovery phrase.
exportingPrivateKey.invalidMessage: Check the above box to confirm

explainer.text1: A private key is also known as a secret key is a string of letter and numbers that allow you to access and manage your assets on one address.
explainer.text2: A private key only unlocks one address, while a recovery phrase unlocks all addresses that are tied to that phrase.
explainer.text3: If you don’t use recovery phrase, you need to save a private key for each address.

showMnemonic.warningMessage: Anybody that has your recovery phrase can move your assets.
showMnemonic.mnemonicInfo: Why do i need a recovery phrase?

exportingMnemonic.confirmationDesc: I understand that other Recovery Phrases, Ledger, Private Keys or Read-only accounts will not be saved with this recovery phrase.
exportingMnemonic.invalidMessage: Check the above box to confirm

explainer.header: Why do i need a recovery phrase?
explainer.text1: You need a recovery phrase in case you lose access to your computer, wallet or you forget your password.
explainer.text2: Recovery phrase is the only way to regain access to your funds stored on those addresses.
explainer.text3: Taho has the option to import or create multiple recovery phrases. If you have multiple, make sure that you have safely save and store them all.

copyWarning.title: Careful copying content to clipboard
copyWarning.description: It is dangerous to copy your recovery phrase or private key to clipboard, this can result in somebody gaining access to it

priceImpactTooltip.firstLine: Price impact between assets is high.
priceImpactTooltip.secondLine: This is due to low liquidity of the swap pair.

noAssetPriceTooltip.firstLine: We're not able to receive prices for these assets now.
noAssetPriceTooltip.secondLine: Continuing without price information might lead to a loss in value.

dappConnection.createTransactionPermission: Create but not sign transactions for you

genericPages.pageDoesNotExist: This page does not exist. That's all we know.

setPassword.title: Set unlock signing password
setPassword.subtitleFirstLine: You will be asked to enter this

unlock.title: Unlock signing
unlock.subtitle: Enter your signing password to continue

ledger.onlyRejectFromLedger: Tx can only be Rejected from Ledger

prepare.subheading: Make sure you take these 3 steps before we {{subheadingWord}}
prepare.stepsExplainer: Please follow the steps below and click on Try Again!
prepare.tip: After clicking continue, select device and click connect

onboarding.multipleLedgersDescriptor: You can select as many as you want

connectionStatus.availableButNoSigning: Ledger is connected but cannot sign

busy.title: Ledger is busy
busy.helpMessage: Looks like your Ledger has another signature in progress.
busy.step1: Accept or Reject transaction on device

wrongLedger.title: Wrong Ledger
wrongLedger.helpMessage: Looks like you are using the wrong Ledger.
wrongLedger.connectLedger: Connect the Ledger containing this account:

errors.limitTooLow: Gas Limit must be higher than 21000
errors.invalidLimit: Gas Limit must be a number

optimism.title: Network fees
optimism.header: Gas fees on {{name}} work differently from Ethereum.
optimism.explainerOne: The estimated gas cost for {{name}} transactions includes an {{name}} fee + an Ethereum roll-up fee (the fee to register transaction on Ethereum chain).
optimism.explainerTwo: Taho stays in sync with the current {{name}} and Ethereum network fees to estimate the fee for a given transaction.
optimism.explainerThree: Only in rare cases will the actual fee you pay change by more than 25% from the estimate.

rsk.title: Network fees
rsk.header: Gas fees on RSK work differently from Ethereum.
rsk.explainerOne: The estimated gas price for RSK transactions is calculated by adding 10% to the Minimum Gas Price obtained from the latest mined block.
rsk.explainerTwo: Taho stays in sync with the current RSK and Ethereum network fees to estimate the fee for a given transaction.
rsk.explainerThree: Only in rare cases will the actual fee you pay change by more than 10% from the estimate.

bsc.title: Coming soon!
bsc.description: Changing network fees for BNB Chain is not currently available.

header.title: Total NFTs floor price
header.emptyDesc: Add more accounts to see your NFTs, you can also just add read-only accounts

nfts.networksBanner: Not seeing NFTs from all your networks? Activate a network by switching to it on the Wallet tab.

filters.title: Filter collections
filters.warning: Changing filters here will affect your Portfolio page as well.

tabbed.walletShortcut: Did you know that you can open Taho using a keyboard shortcut?

newSeed.tip: If you want an easy way to preview Taho, you can start by adding a read only account.

addWallet.tip: Several of Taho's most popular features were developed by our community.

viewOnly.tip: A good way to take a peek at what Taho offers.

importSeed.tip: Taho offers the possibility of adding multiple recovery phrases.

addWallet.title: Use existing wallet
addWallet.tip: You can always add more wallets later.

importSeed.title: Import secret recovery phrase
importSeed.subtitle: Paste or type your 12 to 24 word secret recovery phrase below.

errors.phraseLengthError: Must be a 12 or 24 word recovery phrase

importPrivateKey.title: Import private key
importPrivateKey.subtitle: Importing a private key does not associate it to a secret recovery phrase, but it’s still protected by the same password
importPrivateKey.browseFiles: Browse files or drag and drop your {{type}} file
importPrivateKey.decryptingTime: this may take up to 1 minute
importPrivateKey.wrongPassword: Wrong password or incorrect file. Ensure file is correct and enter the password you used when encrypting it.

viewOnly.title: Read-only address
viewOnly.subtitle: Add an Ethereum address or ENS name to view an existing wallet in Taho
viewOnly.tip: You can upgrade a read-only wallet later.

newWalletIntro.title: Before we get started
newWalletIntro.warning:
It's important to write down your secret recovery phrase and store it somewhere safe.

This is the only way to recover your accounts and funds.

You will not be able to export your recovery phrase later.
newWalletIntro.tip: You can upgrade a read-only wallet later.

newWalletReview.title: Save and store your recovery phrase

newWalletVerify.title: Verify recovery phrase
newWalletVerify.subtitle: Click on each word in the order that you are asked to
newWalletVerify.invalidStateMsg: Verify the order and remove the ones that aren't in the right position.
newWalletVerify.tip: If you didn’t write it down, you can <url>start with a new phrase.</url>

complete.title: Welcome to Taho
complete.subtitle: For faster access we recommend pinning Taho to your browser

seedVerification.seedMismatchExplainer: We are sorry, the recovery phrase you entered did not match. You can try to re-order them, but make sure you have them written down.
seedVerification.createNewWallet: If you prefer you can <1><0>create a new wallet.<0></1>
seedVerification.successExplainer: Secret recovery phrase is correct and you can now start using your new wallet.

importExistingWallet.phraseLengthError: Must be a 12 or 24 word recovery phrase
importExistingWallet.enterPhrasePrompt: Copy paste or write down a 12 or 24 word secret recovery phrase.
importExistingWallet.helpFindPhrase: How do I find the recovery phrase?

overview.nftsTooltip: NFTs here are shown based on your filters in the NFT page.

passwordStrength.hintDesc: For a strong password, consider a mix of lower and uppercase characters, symbols, and numbers. Passwords should be over 8 characters.

settings.autoLockTimer.label: Auto-lock timer
settings.autoLockTimer.tooltip: How long after your last interaction should we lock the wallet?
settings.useFlashbotsTooltip:
Sends all transactions through Flashbots to protect against frontrunning and shares MEV back with you.

This can leak some information about your transactions to searchers, see the Flashbots documentation for more.

exportLogs.title: Bug report
exportLogs.discordDesc: Visit us on our Discord channel, and report your bug there. Make sure to include the logs.
exportLogs.logDesc: To better understand your bug, we need you to export your logs.

analyticsSetUp.title: Analytics
analyticsSetUp.toggleDesc: Analytics help us understand your needs and empower us to build a better wallet for you

addCustomAssetSettings.input.contractAddress.label: Contract address

Find the asset on your favorite block explorer, then copy the contract address here.

Haven't done this before? Check out Knowledge Center first.

customNetworksSettings.title: Custom networks (beta)
customNetworksSettings.deleteModal.title: Remove custom network?
customNetworksSettings.deleteModal.desc: You are removing <name>{{name}}</name>. This means you won't be able to see assets from it and it won't be in your network selection list.

chainList.description: is the fastest, safest way to add a custom network. Just connect your wallet, search for the network you want to add, and click Add to Taho.

customRPC.description: You can also add a custom RPC, this can be a bit risky as you might add a malicious RPC without knowing, that could result in loss of funds.

unverifiedAssets.tooltip:
Discover assets that you own but are not on our asset list. Some spam/scam assets may show up, so treat them with caution.

They will show up on the bottom of the asset page until you verify them.

spendApproval.title: Approve asset spend
spendApproval.tooltip1: Spend limit is the amount of funds from a particular asset that you allow a contract to spend.
spendApproval.tooltip2: Infinite tx has the drawback that if the contract is malicious, it can steal all your funds.

rewards.body: This week, 240,000 DOGGO tokens will be equally shared as Swap Rewards.
rewards.tooltip: Taho rewards its users that use swap every week. A council decides weekly prizes and who is eligible.

activities.defaultHistoricalActivityExplainer: All your new transactions will show up here.
activities.historicalActivityExplainer: Taho will populate your historical activity over time; this may take an hour or more for accounts that have been active for a long time. For new accounts, new activity will show up here.
activities.endOfList: You have reached the end of activity list.

banner.notificationDismissInfo: Want to receive future Odyssey notifications? We will show you one every week that you can dismiss.
banner.snackbar: You can turn notification back from Settings

wallet.sendToContractWarning: This is a contract address, sending assets could result in loss of funds.

defaultToggle.snackbar: You can change this in Settings later

analyticsNotification.description: They help us improve the wallet.  You can disable anytime

banner.description: Be aware of scam and spam assets, only interact with assets you trust.

defaultConnectionPopover.title: Connecting with Taho

defaultConnectionPopover.toggleLabel: Use the toggle at the top to connect with MetaMask or another wallet.

emptyState.title: No abilities here
emptyState.desc: Add more accounts to see your abilities or change filters

banner.description: Daylight tells you when you qualify for an airdrop, mint or unlock.

deleteSlideUpMenu.title: Delete ability?
deleteSlideUpMenu.desc: If you delete an ability you won't be able to see it anymore

filters.title: Filter Abilities

abilityTypeDesc.vote: A proposal that someone can vote on based on a token they hold.
abilityTypeDesc.claim: On-chain reward that someone can claim that is not a mint or airdrop.
abilityTypeDesc.airdrop: A ERC-20 token airdrop, usually not promised in advance.
abilityTypeDesc.mint: A ERC-721 or ERC-11555 token mint.
abilityTypeDesc.access: A general off-chain token-gated experience, often a group chat.
abilityTypeDesc.event: An event, often at a conference or a token-gated online experience.
abilityTypeDesc.article: A blog post or article about a specific token.
abilityTypeDesc.result: The result of a vote proposal.
abilityTypeDesc.misc: An ability that does not fall into any of these types.

filters.accountsReadOnlyInfo: Read-only accounts can’t see abilities. If you can, we recommend you import the address you want to see abilities for.

globalError.title: Ups, nothing to see here
globalError.desc: Looks like you encountered an empty bowl, try refreshing the page to see if something appears

globalModal.title: Hello World. Meet Taho.
globalModal.description1: In 2021, Tally Ho came into the world on a fox hunt. We set our sights on educating the world about the dangers of centralized wallets, and our name was a playful nod to that.
globalModal.description2: But now, our sights are set on a bigger goal. It's time to update our identity.

flags.SUPPORT_CUSTOM_NETWORKS: Show custom network page on settings panel
